mapper.select: select FAQ_SUBJECT, FAQ_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(FAQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FAQ_DATE from(select A.*,rownum as rn from (select FAQ_SUBJECT,FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_DATE from faq_tbl order by FAQ_DATE desc) A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}

select NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT,TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as NOTICE_DATE from(select A.*,rownum as rn from(select NOTICE_SUBJECT,NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE from notice_tbl where NOTICE_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or NOTICE_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by NOTICE_DATE desc) A) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from notice_tbl where NOTICE_SUBJECT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or NOTICE_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
